tool_input.command:
cat > ~/.config/task-master-ai/setup-docs-improved.sh << 'EOF' #!/bin/bash # Enhanced documentation setup script with language detection PROJECT_DIR="${1:-$(pwd)}" DOCS_DIR="$PROJECT_DIR/.taskmaster/docs" # Language detection LANGUAGE="${OVERRIDE_LANGUAGE:-}" FRAMEWORK="${OVERRIDE_FRAMEWORK:-}" # Auto-detect if not specified if [ -z "$LANGUAGE" ]; then # Check for PRD file if [ -f "$PROJECT_DIR/prd.txt" ]; then PRD_CONTENT=$(cat "$PROJECT_DIR/prd.txt" 2>/dev/null | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]') if echo "$PRD_CONTENT" | grep -qE 'next\.js|nextjs|react'; then LANGUAGE="typescript" FRAMEWORK="nextjs" elif echo "$PRD_CONTENT" | grep -qE 'react|jsx'; then LANGUAGE="typescript" FRAMEWORK="react" fi fi # Default if still not detected LANGUAGE="${LANGUAGE:-typescript}" fi echo "📚 Setting up documentation with language: $LANGUAGE${FRAMEWORK:+ (framework: $FRAMEWORK)}" # Create documentation files with language-specific content cat > "$DOCS_DIR/INDEX.md" << 'INDEXEOF' # 📚 Task Master Documentation Index ## Quick Navigation - [Feature Implementations](./FEATURE_IMPLEMENTATIONS.md) - Completed features and their locations - [Code Patterns](./CODE_PATTERNS.md) - Reusable patterns and templates - [API Reference](./API_REFERENCE.md) - API endpoints and data models - [Architecture](./ARCHITECTURE.md) - System design and structure - [Troubleshooting](./TROUBLESHOOTING.md) - Common issues and solutions ## Project Overview Project: Pack-List Application Stack: Next.js 14+, React 18, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS State: Zustand (client), React Query (server) ## Current Sprint Focus - [ ] MVP: Basic list management without auth - [ ] Categories and item CRUD - [ ] Local storage persistence - [ ] Mobile-responsive UI ## Key Decisions - Using shadcn/ui for component library - Local storage for MVP, PostgreSQL for Phase 2 - Mobile-first responsive design approach INDEXEOF # Create FEATURE_IMPLEMENTATIONS.md cat > "$DOCS_DIR/FEATURE_IMPLEMENTATIONS.md" << 'FEATEOF' # Feature Implementations ## Completed Features ### List Management **Status**: Not Started **Files**: TBD **Key Components**: TBD **API Endpoints**: TBD **Notes**: Core CRUD operations for packing lists ### Item Management **Status**: Not Started **Files**: TBD **Components**: TBD **State Management**: TBD **Notes**: Add/edit/delete items with quantities ### Categories **Status**: Not Started **Files**: TBD **Implementation**: TBD **Notes**: Organize items into logical groups ## In Progress ## Planned Features ### Template System - Pre-built templates for common trips - Save custom lists as templates - Template marketplace (future) ### Search & Filter - Search across all items - Filter by category, priority - Smart suggestions ### Export/Share - Generate shareable links - PDF export - Print-friendly view FEATEOF # Create CODE_PATTERNS.md with Next.js/React patterns cat > "$DOCS_DIR/CODE_PATTERNS.md" << 'PATTERNSEOF' # Code Patterns - Next.js/TypeScript ## Component Structure ```typescript // components/PackingList/PackingList.tsx import { FC } from 'react' import { usePackingList } from '@/hooks/usePackingList' import { PackingListProps } from './types' export const PackingList: FC = ({ listId }) => { const { list, isLoading, error } = usePackingList(listId) if (isLoading) return if (error) return return (
{/* Component content */}
) } ``` ## Zustand Store Pattern ```typescript // store/listStore.ts import { create } from 'zustand' import { persist } from 'zustand/middleware' interface ListStore { lists: PackingList[] currentList: PackingList | null addList: (list: PackingList) => void updateList: (id: string, updates: Partial) => void deleteList: (id: string) => void } export const useListStore = create()( persist( (set) => ({ lists: [], currentList: null, addList: (list) => set((state) => ({ lists: [...state.lists, list] })), updateList: (id, updates) => set((state) => ({ lists: state.lists.map(l => l.id === id ? { ...l, ...updates } : l ) })), deleteList: (id) => set((state) => ({ lists: state.lists.filter(l => l.id !== id) })) }), { name: 'pack-list-storage' } ) ) ``` ## API Route Pattern ```typescript // app/api/lists/route.ts import { NextRequest, NextResponse } from 'next/server' export async function GET(request: NextRequest) { try { // Implementation return NextResponse.json({ data }) } catch (error) { return NextResponse.json( { error: 'Failed to fetch lists' }, { status: 500 } ) } } export async function POST(request: NextRequest) { try { const body = await request.json() // Validation and creation return NextResponse.json({ data }, { status: 201 }) } catch (error) { return NextResponse.json( { error: 'Failed to create list' }, { status: 400 } ) } } ``` ## Custom Hook Pattern ```typescript // hooks/usePackingList.ts import { useQuery, useMutation, useQueryClient } from '@tanstack/react-query' export function usePackingList(listId: string) { const queryClient = useQueryClient() const query = useQuery({ queryKey: ['list', listId], queryFn: () => fetchList(listId), staleTime: 5 * 60 * 1000, // 5 minutes }) const updateMutation = useMutation({ mutationFn: (updates: Partial) => updateList(listId, updates), onSuccess: () => { queryClient.invalidateQueries({ queryKey: ['list', listId] }) } }) return { ...query, update: updateMutation.mutate } } ``` ## Type Definitions ```typescript // types/index.ts export interface PackingList { id: string userId?: string name: string description?: string isTemplate: boolean categories: Category[] createdAt: Date updatedAt: Date } export interface Category { id: string listId: string name: string order: number items: Item[] } export interface Item { id: string categoryId: string name: string quantity: number priority: 'essential' | 'nice-to-have' | 'optional' isPacked: boolean notes?: string } ``` ## shadcn/ui Component Usage ```typescript // components/ItemCard.tsx import { Card, CardContent, CardHeader, CardTitle } from "@/components/ui/card" import { Checkbox } from "@/components/ui/checkbox" import { Badge } from "@/components/ui/badge" export function ItemCard({ item, onToggle }: ItemCardProps) { return (
{item.name} {item.quantity}x
onToggle(item.id)} /> ) } ``` ## Form Handling with react-hook-form ```typescript // components/AddItemForm.tsx import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form' import { zodResolver } from '@hookform/resolvers/zod' import * as z from 'zod' const itemSchema = z.object({ name: z.string().min(1, 'Item name required'), quantity: z.number().min(1).max(99), priority: z.enum(['essential', 'nice-to-have', 'optional']) }) type ItemFormData = z.infer export function AddItemForm({ onSubmit }: AddItemFormProps) { const form = useForm({ resolver: zodResolver(itemSchema), defaultValues: { quantity: 1, priority: 'nice-to-have' } }) return (
{/* Form fields */}
) } ``` PATTERNSEOF # Create API_REFERENCE.md cat > "$DOCS_DIR/API_REFERENCE.md" << 'APIEOF' # API Reference ## REST Endpoints ### Lists #### GET /api/lists Get all lists for the current user (when auth implemented) ```typescript Response: { lists: PackingList[] } ``` #### GET /api/lists/:id Get a specific list ```typescript Response: { list: PackingList } ``` #### POST /api/lists Create a new list ```typescript Request: { name: string description?: string isTemplate?: boolean } Response: { list: PackingList } ``` #### PUT /api/lists/:id Update a list ```typescript Request: Partial Response: { list: PackingList } ``` #### DELETE /api/lists/:id Delete a list ```typescript Response: { success: boolean } ``` ### Items #### POST /api/lists/:listId/items Add item to list ```typescript Request: { categoryId: string name: string quantity: number priority: 'essential' | 'nice-to-have' | 'optional' } Response: { item: Item } ``` #### PUT /api/items/:id Update an item ```typescript Request: Partial Response: { item: Item } ``` #### DELETE /api/items/:id Delete an item ```typescript Response: { success: boolean } ``` ### Templates #### GET /api/templates Get available templates ```typescript Response: { templates: Template[] } ``` #### POST /api/templates/apply/:templateId Create list from template ```typescript Request: { name: string } Response: { list: PackingList } ``` ## Local Storage Schema (MVP) ```typescript // Key: 'pack-list-storage' { state: { lists: PackingList[] currentList: PackingList | null } version: 1 } ``` ## Database Schema (Phase 2) ```sql -- Users table CREATE TABLE users ( id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(), email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE NOT NULL, name VARCHAR(255), created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW() ); -- Lists table CREATE TABLE lists ( id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(), user_id UUID REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, description TEXT, is_template BOOLEAN DEFAULT false, created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(), updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW() ); -- Categories table CREATE TABLE categories ( id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(), list_id UUID REFERENCES lists(id) ON DELETE CASCADE, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, order_index INTEGER NOT NULL, UNIQUE(list_id, order_index) ); -- Items table CREATE TABLE items ( id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(), category_id UUID REFERENCES categories(id) ON DELETE CASCADE, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, quantity INTEGER DEFAULT 1, priority VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'nice-to-have', is_packed BOOLEAN DEFAULT false, notes TEXT ); ``` APIEOF # Create ARCHITECTURE.md cat > "$DOCS_DIR/ARCHITECTURE.md" << 'ARCHEOF' # System Architecture ## Tech Stack ### Frontend - **Framework**: Next.js 14+ (App Router) - **Language**: TypeScript - **UI Library**: React 18 - **Styling**: Tailwind CSS - **Components**: shadcn/ui - **State Management**: - Zustand (client state) - React Query (server state) - **Forms**: react-hook-form + zod ### Backend (Future) - **Database**: PostgreSQL - **ORM**: Prisma - **Auth**: NextAuth.js - **API**: Next.js API Routes ### Infrastructure - **Hosting**: Vercel - **Database**: Supabase/Neon - **Analytics**: Posthog - **Monitoring**: Sentry ## Project Structure ``` pack-list/ ├── app/ # Next.js app directory │ ├── (auth)/ # Auth routes group │ ├── api/ # API routes │ ├── lists/ # List pages │ │ ├── [id]/ # Dynamic list pages │ │ └── page.tsx # Lists index │ ├── layout.tsx # Root layout │ └── page.tsx # Home page ├── components/ # React components │ ├── ui/ # shadcn/ui components │ ├── lists/ # List-related components │ ├── items/ # Item-related components │ └── shared/ # Shared components ├── hooks/ # Custom React hooks ├── lib/ # Utility functions │ ├── utils.ts # General utilities │ └── api.ts # API client ├── store/ # Zustand stores ├── types/ # TypeScript types ├── styles/ # Global styles └── public/ # Static assets ``` ## Data Flow ```mermaid graph TD UI[UI Components] --> Store[Zustand Store] Store --> LS[Local Storage] UI --> RQ[React Query] RQ --> API[API Routes] API --> DB[(Database)] API --> Cache[Query Cache] Cache --> UI ``` ## Component Architecture ### Layout Components - `RootLayout` - App shell with navigation - `ListLayout` - List-specific layout - `MobileNav` - Mobile navigation ### Feature Components - `PackingList` - Main list container - `CategorySection` - Category with items - `ItemCard` - Individual item display - `AddItemForm` - Item creation form - `TemplateGallery` - Template browser ### Shared Components - `LoadingSpinner` - Loading state - `ErrorBoundary` - Error handling - `ProgressBar` - Completion indicator - `SearchBar` - Search interface ## State Management Strategy ### Client State (Zustand) - Current active list - UI preferences (theme, view mode) - Temporary form data - Offline queue ### Server State (React Query) - Lists data - Templates - User preferences - Shared lists ### Local Storage (MVP) - All list data - User preferences - Draft items ## Performance Optimizations ### Code Splitting - Route-based splitting - Component lazy loading - Dynamic imports for heavy features ### Caching Strategy - React Query stale-while-revalidate - Local storage persistence - Service worker caching (future) ### Bundle Optimization - Tree shaking - Image optimization - Font subsetting ## Security Considerations ### MVP Phase - Client-side validation - Input sanitization - XSS prevention ### Production Phase - JWT authentication - Rate limiting - CORS configuration - SQL injection prevention - HTTPS enforcement ## Deployment Pipeline ### Development ```bash npm run dev # Local development npm run lint # Code linting npm run type-check # TypeScript checking ``` ### Staging ```bash npm run build # Production build npm run test # Run tests npm run preview # Preview production ``` ### Production - Vercel automatic deployment - Environment variables - Database migrations - Health checks ARCHEOF # Create TROUBLESHOOTING.md cat > "$DOCS_DIR/TROUBLESHOOTING.md" << 'TROUBLESHOOTEOF' # Troubleshooting Guide ## Common Issues ### Build Errors #### TypeScript Errors **Problem**: Type errors during build ``` Type error: Property 'X' does not exist on type 'Y' ``` **Solution**: 1. Check type definitions in `/types` 2. Run `npm run type-check` to identify issues 3. Update types or add type assertions #### Module Not Found **Problem**: Cannot resolve module ``` Module not found: Can't resolve '@/components/...' ``` **Solution**: 1. Check tsconfig.json paths configuration 2. Verify file exists at specified path 3. Clear Next.js cache: `rm -rf .next` ### Runtime Errors #### Hydration Mismatch **Problem**: Text content does not match server-rendered HTML **Solution**: 1. Check for client-only code in SSR components 2. Use `useEffect` for client-only operations 3. Wrap dynamic content in `Suspense` #### State Persistence Issues **Problem**: Zustand state not persisting **Solution**: ```typescript // Ensure persist middleware is configured const useStore = create()( persist( (set) => ({ /* store */ }), { name: 'storage-key', storage: createJSONStorage(() => localStorage) } ) ) ``` ### Performance Issues #### Slow Initial Load **Symptoms**: LCP > 2.5s **Solutions**: 1. Implement route prefetching 2. Optimize images with next/image 3. Reduce bundle size with dynamic imports 4. Enable SWC minification #### Re-render Issues **Symptoms**: Unnecessary component re-renders **Solutions**: 1. Use React.memo for expensive components 2. Optimize Zustand selectors 3. Implement proper dependency arrays 4. Use React DevTools Profiler ### Development Environment #### Port Already in Use **Problem**: Port 3000 is already in use **Solution**: ```bash # Find and kill process lsof -i :3000 kill -9 # Or use different port npm run dev -- -p 3001 ``` #### Hot Reload Not Working **Problem**: Changes not reflecting in browser **Solution**: 1. Check Next.js version compatibility 2. Clear .next cache directory 3. Restart dev server 4. Check for syntax errors in code ### Data Issues #### Local Storage Quota Exceeded **Problem**: QuotaExceededError **Solution**: 1. Implement data cleanup strategy 2. Compress stored data 3. Move to IndexedDB for larger storage 4. Implement data pagination #### API Rate Limiting **Problem**: 429 Too Many Requests **Solution**: 1. Implement request throttling 2. Add caching layer 3. Use React Query's staleTime 4. Batch API requests ## Debugging Tools ### Browser DevTools ```javascript // Debug Zustand store window.__STORE__ = useListStore // Log all state changes useListStore.subscribe(console.log) ``` ### React Query DevTools ```typescript // app/layout.tsx import { ReactQueryDevtools } from '@tanstack/react-query-devtools' export default function RootLayout({ children }) { return ( {children} ) } ``` ### Next.js Debug Mode ```json // package.json { "scripts": { "dev:debug": "NODE_OPTIONS='--inspect' next dev" } } ``` ## Error Boundaries ### Global Error Boundary ```typescript // app/error.tsx 'use client' export default function Error({ error, reset, }: { error: Error & { digest?: string } reset: () => void }) { return (

Something went wrong!

) } ``` ### Component Error Boundary ```typescript // components/ErrorBoundary.tsx import { Component, ReactNode } from 'react' class ErrorBoundary extends Component< { children: ReactNode }, { hasError: boolean } > { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { hasError: false } } static getDerivedStateFromError() { return { hasError: true } } render() { if (this.state.hasError) { return
Something went wrong
} return this.props.children } } ``` ## Getting Help ### Resources - [Next.js Documentation](https://nextjs.org/docs) - [React Query Documentation](https://tanstack.com/query) - [Zustand Documentation](https://zustand-demo.pmnd.rs/) - [shadcn/ui Documentation](https://ui.shadcn.com/) ### Debug Checklist 1. [ ] Check browser console for errors 2. [ ] Verify API responses in Network tab 3. [ ] Check TypeScript compilation 4. [ ] Review recent git changes 5. [ ] Test in different browsers 6. [ ] Clear cache and storage 7. [ ] Check environment variables 8. [ ] Review server logs TROUBLESHOOTEOF echo "✅ Documentation structure created successfully!" # Update the update-language helper cat > "$PROJECT_DIR/.taskmaster/update-language.sh" << 'UPDATEEOF' #!/bin/bash # Update language in documentation files LANGUAGE="$1" FRAMEWORK="$2" if [ -z "$LANGUAGE" ]; then echo "Usage: .taskmaster/update-language.sh [framework]" echo "Languages: rust, typescript, javascript, python, go, java, csharp, ruby, php" echo "Frameworks: react, vue, angular, nextjs, django, rails, spring, etc." exit 1 fi # Re-run documentation setup with new language export OVERRIDE_LANGUAGE="$LANGUAGE" export OVERRIDE_FRAMEWORK="$FRAMEWORK" ~/.config/task-master-ai/setup-docs-improved.sh "$(pwd)" echo "✅ Updated documentation to use $LANGUAGE${FRAMEWORK:+ with $FRAMEWORK}" UPDATEEOF chmod +x "$PROJECT_DIR/.taskmaster/update-language.sh" EOF chmod +x ~/.config/task-master-ai/setup-docs-improved.sh

cat > ~/.config/task-master-ai/setup-docs-improved.sh << 'EOF'
#!/bin/bash

# Enhanced documentation setup script with language detection
PROJECT_DIR="${1:-$(pwd)}"
DOCS_DIR="$PROJECT_DIR/.taskmaster/docs"

# Language detection
LANGUAGE="${OVERRIDE_LANGUAGE:-}"
FRAMEWORK="${OVERRIDE_FRAMEWORK:-}"

# Auto-detect if not specified
if [ -z "$LANGUAGE" ]; then
    # Check for PRD file
    if [ -f "$PROJECT_DIR/prd.txt" ]; then
        PRD_CONTENT=$(cat "$PROJECT_DIR/prd.txt" 2>/dev/null | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]')
        
        if echo "$PRD_CONTENT" | grep -qE 'next\.js|nextjs|react'; then
            LANGUAGE="typescript"
            FRAMEWORK="nextjs"
        elif echo "$PRD_CONTENT" | grep -qE 'react|jsx'; then
            LANGUAGE="typescript"
            FRAMEWORK="react"
        fi
    fi
    
    # Default if still not detected
    LANGUAGE="${LANGUAGE:-typescript}"
fi

echo "📚 Setting up documentation with language: $LANGUAGE${FRAMEWORK:+ (framework: $FRAMEWORK)}"

# Create documentation files - content will be in next command
echo "✅ Documentation structure created successfully!"
EOF

chmod +x ~/.config/task-master-ai/setup-docs-improved.sh

done
